<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>update column_label for `whitelisted` to `Opted in all topics by default`</description>
        <name>Update Label on Chat Channel Field</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_cs_channel');
gr.addQuery('element', 'whitelisted');
gr.addQuery('language', 'en');
gr.query();
if(gr.next() && gr.getValue('label') == 'Whitelisted') {
    gr.setValue('label', 'Opted in all topics by default');
    gr.update();
}]]></script>
